answers.answer: Hello,Sexual problem or weakness is also known as erectile dysfunction. The causes are many like diabetes, depression, autonomic nervous system problem, excessive alcohol ingestion or tobacco smoking etc. Reduced sexual function and temporary infertility can also occur in males who take anabolic steroids but these side effects are temporary which go away after leaving anabolic steroids.You may need to consult your doctor to see which amongst these causes are responsible for your problem.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: hi,i am 29 yrs old man, a virgin, about to get married. i was in a relation and got physical with my girlfrend, when i realized that i am suffering from erectile dysfunction. i was not hard at all, and even when i got hard it lasted only for 30-40 seconds or so. this was the first time i faced such problem. i thought might be coz of the first time it could have happened, but this continued even the 6th time i got physical with her. ultimately i ended up losing my girlfrend.now i am about to get married, and really worried.as a medical background, i have been consuming dexamethasone and practin tablets twice daily since 4 years now, since i am a lot into gym and body building.i wonder if this decadan and practin are the cause for the impotence.is this curable ? coz i dont want to ruin my upcoming married life.please advise and help me...its my earnest request.PS: i tried Megalis 20mg when i got physical with my girlfrend. it didnt work either. please help
title: urgent help needed.
